item.title: BYU-Idaho
item.description: BYU-Idaho Center Auditorium: Devotionals are special worship services and an important setting for studying the doctrines and principles of the restored gospel. Each week, speakers and many other individuals strive to provide a meaningful experience where the Spirit can teach and enlighten us.
item.author: Brigham Young University - Idaho

item.title: Service - Stories from General Conference
item.description: Service is how we can show love to those around us. Listen to stories of service and how the giver and receiver were blessed.
item.author: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

item.title: Jesus Christ - Stories from General Conference
item.description: Listen to stories about Jesus Christ's life and ministry.
item.author: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
